name: Gomorrah
details:
Subharmonic fuzzThe LastGasp Art Laboratories Gomorrah is a subharmonic fuzz pedal of biblical proportions. The pedal emits an ersatz lower octave signal, where the pitch is entirely dependent on the characteristics of the input signal. If the signal is strong, the pitch is emitted as played; if the intensity falls to the middle range, the pitch moves an octave down; if the intensity is lackadaisical, the pitch shifts two octaves down. 
Level Control
Tone Control
Sensitivity Control
Mode Switch
Bypass Footswitch
